comment: Alternate proof of ~ vtxdusgr0edgnel , not based on ~ vtxduhgr0edgnel . A vertex in a simple graph has degree 0 if there is no edge incident with this vertex. (Contributed by AV, 17-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
